name: @ctx-core/a__target
description: A__Target component which sets target to _blank for absolute urls or _self for relative urls
author: Brian Takita

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-components && npm run compile
scripts.clean: rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -f src/**/*.js && rm -f src/**/*.d.ts && rm -f src/**/*.map
scripts.copy-components: cd src && find . | grep \.svelte$ | awk '{print "mkdir -p dirname "$1" && cp -f "$1" ../dist/"$1}'
